text:
Embark on a magical 4D flying bus adventure to Far Far Away this winter! See, hear, smell, and laugh your way through an unforgettable experience — perfect for fun-filled winter days. Book now and make memories that sparkle all season long!
Welcome to the official website for Shrek's Adventure in London! Book tickets online for the best price guaranteed and enjoy our magical fairytale experience.
Embark on a magical 4D flying bus adventure to Far Far Away this winter! See, hear, smell, and laugh your way through an unforgettable experience — perfect for fun-filled winter days. Book now and make memories that sparkle all season long!

Standard ticket
Embark on a magical 4D flying bus adventure to Far Far Away this winter! See, hear, smell, and laugh your way through an unforgettable experience — perfect for fun-filled winter days. Book now and make memories that sparkle all season long!
BOOK NOW
From £29 per adult
Anytime entry
Enjoy maximum flexibility this winter and arrive anytime on your chosen date. Perfect for a spontaneous, cosy day out in London with family or friends!
BOOK NOW
2 attractions £49 Save up to 31%
Shrek’s Adventure + London Eye
Go on an epic journey through Shrek's enchanting Swamp, then take in the best of London’s skyline — all for under £25 per attraction! With 90 days to use your tickets, there’s plenty of time to plan a magical winter outing for the whole family.
BOOK NOW
2 attractions £49 Save up to 31%
Shrek's Adventure + SEA LIFE
Explore Shrek's swamp, then dive into the wonders of SEA LIFE London Aquarium, discovering over 1,200 amazing creatures from the deep and beyond. Valid for 90 days after your adventure, giving you the freedom to spread out the fun this winter season.
BOOK NOW
What is Shrek's Adventure London?
It is a brilliantly bonkers, interactive and immersive walkthrough experience, where the whole family can journey through Far Far Away as the stars of the show.
See, hear, touch and smell the adventure by exploring 9 fairytale themed live shows, from a magical 4D flying bus experience, interacting with various famous characters including Princess Fiona and Donkey to collecting the special ingredients that you will need in order to find Shrek and make it home safely.
GO AN ADVENTURE
Your family day out just got bigger
Unleash the ultimate family adventure, keep the kids entertained across multiple days with 5 top London attractions for less than £12 each.
Bundle your Shrek’s Adventure! ticket with up to four more iconic attractions, including the London Eye, SEA LIFE, and Madame Tussauds, and save up to 70%.
Conveniently located close to each other, these magical attractions come with the freedom of 90-day valid tickets, allowing you to explore London's top attractions on your own fairy-tale timeline. Plus, with a variety of family-friendly dining options nearby, we've got all you need for an unforgettable day out in London!
BOOK TOGETHER AND SAVE
Make your visit extra magical
See What's On
Dive into a world of fairy tales with interactive events and enjoy spellbinding activities!
About the adventure
Find out more about the magical adventure that you will go on
Plan your visit
Everything you need to know to help you plan your visit
Booking guarantee
Book with confidence with flexible rescheduling
Tickets and prices
Book online in advance to guarantee the best price for your tickets
Privacy Preference Center
When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.
More information
Allow All
Manage Consent Preferences
Strictly Necessary Cookies
Always Active
These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.
Performance Cookies
Performance Cookies
These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.
Functional Cookies
Functional Cookies
These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.
Targeting Cookies
Targeting Cookies
These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
